abstract: International Coal Ventures of India has no plans to link up with the Tata Group, should Tata attempt to counter Rio Tinto’s takeover offer for the coal producer Riversdale Mining.
snippet: International Coal Ventures of India has no plans to link up with the Tata Group, should Tata attempt to counter Rio Tinto’s takeover offer for the coal producer Riversdale Mining.
lead_paragraph: International Coal Ventures of India has no plans to link up with the Tata Group, should Tata attempt to counter Rio Tinto’s takeover bid for the coal producer Riversdale Mining, the country’s steel minister, Virbhadra Singh, told Dow Jones Newswires on Monday.

headline.main: Indian Mining Firm Unlikely to Join Bid for Riversdale
